__e: My Lord, the warriors of the Book are at your service.
In the air, on land... or on the sea... we're the fightin' men... of the 303.
I can only hope with all the world's warriors gathered against us there might be one down there who's up to the task.
I, too, will go. In the hope of procuring ships and warriors to defend this world.
He paid the Warlords to do it.
You don't need 12,000 fighting men for that.
And do you still trust the leader of the great warriors... who wanted you to be his queen?
Well, do you have any idea of what our training is like and... the type of fighters you might have to face?
No. As a matter of fact, I have a holy army of warriors who are about to rain merry hell down on this world.
I don't know--I don't think I'll have time to do that 'cause I already have Hank and I'm doing math warriors three times a week.
You will go to every home of every warrior in this city.
But look deep in your own heart... and see if you wish to be one of the greatest warriors on earth.
The truth is, we must look into the eyes of our warriors and say,
The only way to save your people is to... find out where the warriors went and why.
